DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct assess safety tolerability ascend multiple oral dos SCA-136 administer healthy Japanese male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety Tolerability SCA-136 Healthy Japanese Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healty Japanese men willing use medically acceptable form contraception . Exclusion criterion : Any significant disease Positive urine drug screen Increased liver function test Use prescription drug .
